Once in a lush forest, there lived a bear named Benny, whose love for honey was unmatched. One sunny day, he discovered a hidden hive atop a towering tree. Benny's heart raced as he climbed, dreaming of sweet golden drips. He devoured the honey, forgetting the time. Days turned into weeks, and Benny grew rounder and rounder. His friends worried, but he just wanted more honey. One fateful night, he got stuck in a hollow tree, unable to escape. His friends rallied, and together they freed him. Realizing the importance of balance, Benny shared his honey and learned to savor, not just consume.
